items.sentence: Tom should know exactly how much money we have to spend.
Tom slept like a log all night and most of the next day.
Tom soon realized there was nothing he could do to help.
Tom spent some time in jail when he was in his thirties.
I don\'t think Mary is as beautiful as her older sister.
I don\'t want to argue about this in front of everybody.
I don\'t want to be treated any differently than before.
As soon as Tom got Mary alone, he told her the bad news.
Did you make a lot of money when you sold your business?
Tom certainly isn\'t the first person who had that idea.
